strengths: Spent over 10 years designing and implementing services, tools and infra with Linux
Write maintainable, modular and expressive Go, Python and JavaScript code
Design patterns, OOP, database design, optimization and query tuning

Every line of code matters, and every sticker is worth collecting

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description:
As a member of the Cloud Security team, my work mainly focuses in observability and infra engineering:

 1. Build API driven infra service for provisioning monitoring services.
 1. Scale up and improve the resilience of existing monitoring systems.
 1. Define, design and deliver new generation observability systems that replace graphite and nagios.
 1. Enable and improve other teams’ operational readiness by directly contributing into their codebase.
 1. Mentor junior devs and interns.
 1. On-call for new and legacy services.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Working at a startup company, my daily life was all about entrepreneurship and multitasking: 1. Change roles from time to time, ranging from dev, tech lead, QA, architect to sysadmin. 1. Daily tasks involve new feature development, firefighting prod issues, architecture design and ops. 1. Helpd build and improve docker based development and testing environments and CI/CD pipelines. 1. Open source advocate in the team. Created and maintained vim-phpfmt, dcm and rex on github. 1. Redesign of legacy async batch processing jobs. Replaced cron job scripts with fault tolerant, highly performant and highly available MQ service and workers. 1. Revamped UI codebase with docker, webpack, karma, ES6 and CLI test runner. Occasionally spoke at local docker and startup related meetups.

experience.title: Application Specialist
experience.description:
At DB Schenker, my work involved:

 1. Design and implement web apps with Zend Framework 2.
 1. Created a custom JavaScript UI library from scratch.
 1. Build ERP modules for ocean freight quotation, global procurement and data analysis.
 1. Introduced better CI workflow, git flow, TDD and modular JavaScript codebase.
 1. Improved application performance with PHP-FPM, Nginx and MongoDB.
 1. Manage Windows and Linux servers, and migrated services from Toronto DC to Denver.
